Brytest.BurnDieDescription: Burn Personality to improve hit and damage rolls, Strength checks, or Fortitude Saves
Brytest.BurnDieHealing: Burn Personality to recover lost hit points
Brytest.BurnDieRecovery: Recover Personality each night equivalent to the Brytest's level
Brytest.RecogniseMushroomsAndFouledWater: Brytest is just a dumb test
Brytest.TrackingSkills: Brytest apply their level as a bonus to tracking, and detection of traps and hidden foes
